body_html:
Hi @Jeffery4000 , it's possible that the IB register memory is not setup correctly in your system.
If you would like more support on this, we need to know

  • os system version
  • physical RAM
  • all parameters inside the /sys/module/mlx4_core/ folder.
    Mlx4 allows users to customize the register memory based on their need, so it's likely that's too small in your system. Since we don't have access to your environment, it's good to consult your system admin to change the register memory setting for IB.

body:
Hi @Jeffery4000 , it's possible that the IB register memory is not setup correctly in your system.
If you would like more support on this, we need to know
- os system version
- physical RAM
- all parameters inside the /sys/module/mlx4_core/ folder.
Mlx4 allows users to customize the register memory based on their need, so it's likely that's too small in your system. Since we don't have access to your environment, it's good to consult your system admin to change the register memory setting for IB.
